title: ‘Tadej Has This Nuclear Attack, If You Follow You Burn Yourself’: Healy, Ciccone Deliver in Liège with Defense Tactics
content:
Podium finishers Giulio Ciccone and Ben Healy had a common strategy going into Liège-Bastogne-Liège.

Read the full article at ‘Tadej Has This Nuclear Attack, If You Follow You Burn Yourself’: Healy, Ciccone Deliver in Liège with Defense Tactics on Velo.
author: sstokes
